ViewObject.Name: ODCustMgrHrchyUpdAccessesVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT 1 FROM JTF_RS_REP_MANAGERS jrrm, JTF_RS_GROUP_USAGES jrgu, XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V aaa, HZ_PARTY_SITES hzps, HZ_PARTY_SITE_USES hzpsu, FND_LOOKUP_VALUES fndl WHERE jrgu.usage IN ('SALES', 'PRM') and jrgu.group_id = jrrm.group_id and jrrm.hierarchy_type IN ('MGR_TO_MGR', 'MGR_TO_REP') and jrrm.resource_id = aaa.resource_id and TRUNC(jrrm.start_date_active) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) and TRUNC(NVL(jrrm.end_date_active, SYSDATE)) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) and aaa.group_id = jrrm.group_id and aaa.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' and nvl(aaa.full_access_flag,'Y') = 'Y' and aaa.entity_id = hzps.party_site_id and hzpsu.party_site_id(+) = hzps.party_site_id and fndl.lookup_type = 'XXOD_ASN_PARTY_SEC_SITE_TYPES' and (nvl(hzps.identifying_address_flag,'N') = 'Y' OR NVL(hzpsu.site_use_type,'*') = fndl.lookup_code) and hzps.status = 'A' and NVL(hzpsu.status,'A') = 'A' and hzps.party_id = :1 and jrrm.parent_resource_id = :2 and jrrm.parent_resource_id <> jrrm.resource_id and ROWNUM = 1 and fnd_profile.value('ASN_CUST_ACCESS')= 'S' UNION SELECT 1 FROM JTF_RS_REP_MANAGERS jrrm, JTF_RS_GROUP_USAGES jrgu, XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V aaa, HZ_PARTY_SITES hzps WHERE jrgu.usage IN ('SALES', 'PRM') and jrgu.group_id = jrrm.group_id and jrrm.hierarchy_type IN ('MGR_TO_MGR', 'MGR_TO_REP') and jrrm.resource_id = aaa.resource_id and TRUNC(jrrm.start_date_active) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) and TRUNC(NVL(jrrm.end_date_active, SYSDATE)) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) and aaa.group_id = jrrm.group_id and aaa.entity_type ='PARTY_SITE' and nvl(aaa.full_access_flag,'Y') = 'Y' and aaa.entity_id = hzps.party_site_id and hzps.party_id = :3 and hzps.status = 'A' and jrrm.parent_resource_id = :4 and jrrm.parent_resource_id <> jrrm.resource_id and ROWNUM = 1 and fnd_profile.value('ASN_CUST_ACCESS')= 'T'
